- the days/hours or attendance pattern you could commit to (including whether you can do full-time vs specific days).

conversation.message:
Dear Nursery_C Admissions Team,

Thank you for your note. I’m happy to confirm our availability details to keep our file up to date.

Start date range:
- Earliest start: immediately (we can begin as soon as you can accommodate).
- Latest start: we can also start later if needed; anytime within the next 2–3 months works for us (and we can align to your preferred intake date).

Attendance pattern / days & hours:
- We can commit to full-time, Monday–Friday.
- If you need specific days instead, we can also do any 3–5 day pattern (we are flexible on which days).
- Hours: we can align to your standard day; early drop-off and later pick-up are both workable for us if offered.

If you do reach the point where you’re able to consider the next families on file, we can accept immediately and complete all paperwork and any deposit the same day.

Kind regards,
Parent_C
